name: Day8_vs_Naive
description: Comparison of gene expression between CD8+ T cells at day 8 post LCMV-Arm infection and naive CD8+ T cells to identify infection-induced transcriptional changes.
justification: This contrast captures the core biological question of how TCR stimulation during acute LCMV infection reprograms naive CD8+ T cells into effector/memory precursors, essential for understanding Runx3â€™s role in CTL differentiation.
